statements: DELETE FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified Developer';
DELETE FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date < NOW();
DELETE FROM employees WHERE certification_id IS NULL;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE certification_id IN (SELECT certification_id FROM certifications WHERE regulatory_compliance_status = TRUE);
DELETE FROM employees WHERE certification_id NOT IN (SELECT certification_id FROM certifications);
DELETE FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = 123 AND certification_name = 'Java Certification';
DELETE FROM EmployeeDepartment WHERE employee_id = 789 AND department_id = 456;
DELETE FROM Department WHERE department_id IN (SELECT department_id FROM EmployeeDepartment WHERE employee_id = 123);
DELETE FROM EmployeeDepartment WHERE employee_id = 456 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE EmployeeDepartment.employee_id = EmployeeCertifications.employee_id);
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Java Certification';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'HR';
